#summary This page contains links and information about all of the current RL-Glue Core downloads.

*Notes:* To use this or any other codec, you must have *THIS* installed first.

=== Available Downloads ===

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/rl-glue-3.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz Java Developer Distribution 3.0-RC-FINAL-1] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=rl-glue-3.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz (File Details)]

=== Quick Install ===
{{{
#Unpack the files
>$ tar -zxf rl-glue-3.0-RC-FINAL-1.tar.gz

#Change to unpacked directory
>$ cd /path/to/rl-glue-3.0-RC-FINAL-1

#Configure the installation (for advanced options see the manual)
>$ ./configure

#Build the software
>$ make

#Install the software (requires admin privileges)
>$ sudo make install
}}}
